SELECT id, _name, _email, DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_date, create_by FROM t_mb_user
AND _name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND _email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
AND date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{create_date}
and delete_flag <> 1
order by create_date desc

SELECT count(id) FROM t_mb_user
AND _name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND _email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
AND date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{create_date}
and delete_flag <> 1
